Back in the 2014-2015, people bashed Ethereum. Those were the same people who missed out. I feel EOS is the next instance of this. Tons of baseless hate. But those who are in it are going to make it big for seeing through the FUD.

Great overview of Moloch DAO by @simondlr. It's an experimental org coordinating resources for issuing grants for Ethereum. Owning stock only allows 1) voting on issuing new stock 2) destroying stock to get access to capital. Interesting game theory ensues  https://t.co/Xv1428GHTm
